title: Fearne Cotton talks about her struggle with depression
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device Fearne Cotton talks about her struggle with depression 21 February 2017 Last updated at 09:03 GMT 
TV and radio host Fearne Cotton discusses her new book, Happy where she reveals her struggle with depression. 
She also gives some practical advice to cope with it - and admits it's a far cry from the life she portrays on social media.
